title: Learner-Centered Feedback Design: VR-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing VR simulation tools in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments, operating with a formative assessment focus to strengthen language job competencies

learning_goals: Learners can use real-time feedback in a VR simulation environment to produce context-appropriate language expressions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze six dimensions of feedback (timing, frequency, source, etc.) and apply them to their learning strategies.
Learners can manage self-directed language practice records at least three times per week using smartphone-based feedback tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
